value.title: DAX Fridays! #31: Rounding Time, Prices and Numbers with DAX
value.excerpt: In today’s DAX Fridays video I will show you how to round time, prices and numbers using ROUND, ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN, INT, TRUNC, ODD, EVEN, MROUND, FLOOR and CEILING.  Rounding numbers, time and prices is a very useful skill as it will give you more control of your dataset and the accurancy in which your

value.title: DAX Fridays! #44: CROSSFILTER

value.title: Combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX

Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
